name: The lost planet: Kepler-186f
description: The lost planet: Kepler-186f is the 38th point and click escape game from crazy escape games. A team of astronomers has sent to explore the lost planet: Kepler-186f, planet that may have potential for mankind to live. You will soon discover that you're not the first astronaut from planet Terra to come here, find your team and explore new environment in order to complete your missions! Good Luck and Have Fun!
